amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to state that additional training shall be provided for covered employees who work with victims of torture, trafficking, or domestic violence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to state that additional training shall be provided for covered employees who work with victims of torture, trafficking, or domestic violence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
